title: The First Law Trilogy Boxed Set: The Blade Itself, Before They Are Hanged, Last Argument of Kings
description: THE FIRST LAW trilogy is a fantasy masterpiece, now available in a single digital edition. It's a perfect gift for fans of A GAME OF THRONES and a great way for new readers to discover one of the most highly acclaimed fantasy trilogies of the past decade.  This ebook contains three novels: THE BLADE ITSELF, BEFORE THEY ARE HANGED and LAST ARGUMENT OF KINGS.
author: Joe Abercrombie
